alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 5:22AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Geauga...Cuyahoga... Lake...Ashtabula...Erie and northern Crawford Counties Until 630 AM EST.... At 519 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 6 miles north of Avon Lake to near Ashtabula to near Wattsburg, moving east at 25 mph. Expect hazardous travel along I-90 from Lake County to the Pennsylvania New York Border. Quick burst of snow moving across Cuyahoga, Lake and Geauga counties will impact the morning commute. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Erie, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Meadville, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Westlake, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake and Warrensville Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 302, 303, 304, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 317, 318, 319, 320, 321, 322, 323, 324, 326, 328, 329, 330, 331, and 332.
